availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles. C. Johnson (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary S. Weaver Johnson. Father of Sarah E. Johnson, George W. Johnson, and John Johnson. Farmer in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, pp. 513-4.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Woods Precinct, p. 482B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 8678.
"Charles C. Johnson (1832-1911)," Find A Grave, Memorial 30246604, accessed October 16, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30246604.
